organisation: Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Disability Network of Queensland (ATSIDNQ)
description: Network connecting Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people with disability & their carers across Queensland.
Community health, dental, medical, youth, aged care, family support for Aboriginal & Torres Strait Islander peoples in Brisbane / Logan.

organisation: Townsville Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Cultural Centre (TATSICC)
description: Cultural centre in Townsville hosting performances, gallery exhibitions, training, tours.
Library-style community centres in Aboriginal shires, combining cultural, educational and community functions.

organisation: Queensland Aboriginal and Islander Health Council (QAIHC)
description: Peak body for ACCHOs in Queensland, supporting and coordinating Aboriginal Community Controlled Health Services.
Queensland Government directory to find Aboriginal & Torres Strait Islander health and medical services.

organisation: AbSec – Aboriginal Child, Family & Community Peak NSW
description: Peak Aboriginal community organisation in NSW providing advice and policy support in child protection and family services.
Provides legal and non-legal support for Aboriginal communities, including child protection and care matters.

organisation: Binaal Billa Family Violence Prevention Legal Service
description: Free legal & case support for family violence, child protection, and advocacy in children’s courts.
Community-run children’s and family services in the Redfern area.
Australia’s first Aboriginal community-controlled health service, providing holistic medical care.
Provides advisory and representative role in education and training for Aboriginal communities across NSW.
Collective supporting Aboriginal artists in Sydney with exhibitions and cultural expression.
Community organisation delivering health, housing and social services in Clarence Valley.
Provides Aboriginal health services across the Clarence Valley including Grafton and Maclean.

organisation: Many Rivers Family Violence Prevention Legal Service
description: Provides legal support and prevention programs for Aboriginal families experiencing violence.
Provides advice, support and advocacy for Aboriginal tenants across NSW.
Peak body managing and supporting Local Aboriginal Land Councils across NSW.
